clientsDescription: We are proud to partner with a diverse range of clients who trust our software to enhance their productivity and efficiency.
clientsSubtitle: Here are some of the esteemed clients we have worked with.
testimonialsDescription: Hear from our satisfied clients about how our software has transformed their work processes.
testimonial1: Our software has significantly improved our team's productivity and efficiency. The detailed analytics and seamless integrations are a game-changer!
testimonial1Footer: Alex Johnson, CEO of Tech Solutions
testimonial2: The advanced time tracking features have helped us monitor our work hours accurately and save a lot of time. Highly recommended!
testimonial2Footer: Sarah Williams, Project Manager at Creative Agency
caseStudiesDescription: Learn how our software has made a significant impact on our clients' businesses.
caseStudy1Description: Tech Solutions experienced a 30% increase in productivity after implementing our software. Their team was able to streamline workflows and improve project tracking.
caseStudy2Description: Creative Agency reduced time spent on administrative tasks by 40%, allowing their team to focus more on creative projects and client work.
ctaTitle: Join Our Growing List of Satisfied Clients
ctaDescription: Start your free trial today and discover how our software can transform your work processes.
featuresHeader: Discover Our DeskTime Features for Enhanced Team Efficiency
featuresDescription: Uncover how our app's time tracking capabilities can boost productivity, streamline workflows, and ultimately save you time and money.
efficientTaskManagementDescription: Manage your tasks seamlessly with DeskTime's intuitive task management system. Suitable for both small teams and large enterprises.
detailedPerformanceAnalyticsDescription: Gain insights into your team's productivity with our comprehensive performance analytics.
seamlessIntegrationsDescription: Connect DeskTime with the tools you already use to ensure a smooth workflow.
seamlessIntegrationsBullet3: Use our API for custom integrations
advancedTimeTrackingDescription: Utilize advanced time tracking features to monitor work hours accurately.
advancedTimeTrackingBullet1: Track time on PC and mobile devices
robustSecurityFeaturesDescription: Keep your data secure with our robust security features.
faqsDescription: Find answers to some of the most commonly asked questions about DeskTime.
faq1Description: DeskTime provides detailed analytics and time tracking features that help identify productivity trends and areas for improvement.
faq2Title: Can DeskTime integrate with other tools?
faq2Description: Yes, DeskTime seamlessly integrates with various project management tools, calendars, and more to ensure a smooth workflow.
faq3Title: Is my data secure with DeskTime?
faq3Description: Absolutely. DeskTime uses robust security features, including data encryption, regular security audits, and access control mechanisms, to keep your data safe.
ctaHeader: Ready to Boost Your Team's Efficiency?
aboutUsDescription: Learn more about our company, our mission, and the team behind our success.
missionDescription: Our mission is to provide innovative time tracking and productivity solutions that help businesses and teams work more efficiently and effectively. We are committed to delivering high-quality software that meets the evolving needs of our clients.
historyDescription: Founded in 2023, our company has grown from a small startup to a leading provider of productivity solutions. Over the years, we have expanded our offerings and continuously improved our software to meet the demands of our diverse clientele.
teamDescription: Our team is comprised of talented professionals dedicated to providing the best service and support to our clients. Get to know the people who make our company great.
taskSchedulerDescription: Organize your day with a powerful task scheduler that allows you to set priorities, due dates, and reminders for your tasks.
timeTrackerDescription: Keep track of how much time you spend on each task with an intuitive time tracker.
calendarIntegrationDescription: Sync your schedules seamlessly with your existing calendar to get a comprehensive view of your commitments and objectives.
analyticsDashboardDescription: Gain insights into your time management with detailed analytics and reporting features.
name: Name
developerDescription: Responsible for writing and maintaining code.
designerDescription: Responsible for designing the user interface and experience.
projectManagerDescription: Responsible for overseeing the project and ensuring it meets deadlines.
testerDescription: Responsible for testing the application for bugs and issues.
projectDescription: This is a detailed description of the project. It outlines the goals, objectives, and deliverables expected from the team.
cloudSolutionDescription:
As a cloud solution, you pay exactly for what you use. 
 Put together your optimal solution and calculate the one-off and ongoing costs for the functions you want.
displayCostsIncurred: Display costs incurred per year or month
costEstimationTraining: Cost estimation training, setting up system
mainTitle: Time tracking software TimeWise, features that inspire.
mainSubtitle: TimeWise's time tracking features and solutions simplify everyday work for you and your team by tailoring them to the specific needs of your organization.
timeWiseDescription: TimeWise makes everyday work easier for you and your team thanks to its smart functions.
workingTimeMeasurementDescription: Time recording for work and absences with TimeWise software includes all functions that are necessary for legal recording of working hours. When setting up, the different needs of small and large companies are taken into account as required.
projectTimeTrackingDescription: Our simple and flexible time recording for projects brings transparency and overview into the recorded project hours and facilitates efficient cost control. Project time recording for service providers, consultants, craftsmen and industrial companies.
dutyShiftPlanningDescription: Shift schedule and roster online. Plan the deployment of your employee teams for the coming weeks and months for the required presence times and locations. Transfer the planned times to the time recording. Employees always receive the latest operational information.
orderPlanningDescription: The gardener, the carpenter, the plumber, the electrician, the cleaner, the painter, the heating fitter or the bricklayer - they all work for the customer and must be planned efficiently. TimeWise supports craft businesses in this process and combines order planning.
timeTrackingSmartphoneDescription: Modern time recording with the TimeWise mobile app. Do everything with your smartphone such as time recording, duty scheduling, order planning, expenses, etc.
integrationInterfacesDescription: Our modern system enables the easy exchange of information that is integrated into TimeWise from third-party systems or read into other systems by TimeWise. This allows you to achieve greater efficiency and secure data exchange.
timeRecordingTabletDescription: The tablet can also be used as a simple clocking device to record employee attendance.
expensesControlDescription: Our expense management allows you to record expenses quickly and easily along with daily working hours. Either by recording on the PC or on the smartphone.
timeClocksTerminalsDescription: With electronic working time recording with a stationary time clock, employees' attendance times are simply recorded as they walk by.
transparentClearDescription: The recorded working times are immediately visible to all parties and bring transparency to time recording. Employees have access to their times and time balances at any time.
simpleFlexibleDescription: The simplicity of use is important to us. We transform individual requirements and extensive options into simple processes and views.
fullCostControlDescription: We know simple and understandable usage fees and offer extensive and integrated support to achieve sustainable customer satisfaction.
quickImplementationDescription: Our application is not only simple and user-friendly, but the clear structure also makes it easier to manage the system efficiently and introduce it quickly.
availableOnlineDescription: Our solution is in the cloud in Switzerland. It can therefore be used from anywhere and supports today's digital and location-independent way of working.
scalableCompanySizeDescription: ClickTime is very simple and clear for small businesses or comprehensive with many additional functions for companies with more complex requirements.
